document_data.mainbody:
Xaryxispace was a small star system in wildspace that was home to the Xaryxian Empire of astral elves.
The system consisted of the star Xaryxis and three natural satellites, the planets Rivus, Vaerduran, and Xaryndar.
Also situated within the system was the elf-made Imperial Citadel of the Xaryxian elves. The citadel siphoned power from the star Xaryxis directly, by means of a  beam of light.
